history.proof: intros. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx0|Hx0]|Hx0]. - srun best use: Rlt_0_1 unfold: Rle. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto use: Rle_lt_trans, Rgt_not_eq unfold: Rgt.

original: intros x Hx. unfold sign. destruct (total_order_T 0 x) as [[Hx0|Hx0]|Hx0]. - apply sign_eq_1. apply Hx0. - apply sign_eq_m1. lra. - apply Rle_zero_pos_plus1 in Hx. lra.
